title: ‘Finding Harmony’ Documentary on King Charles Shows His Longtime Concern for Environment
summary_full: Environmentalism may have gone out of fashion on Wall Street and in the White House, but the British monarch says he remains deeply committed to the cause in a new documentary, ‘Finding Harmony’.
summary_public: Environmentalism may have gone out of fashion on Wall Street and in the White House, but the British monarch says he remains deeply committed to the cause in a new documentary, ‘Finding Harmony’.

GB.label: neutral
